Plot: A family of Irish immigrants adjust to life on the mean streets of Hell's Kitchen while also grieving the death of a child.
Title: In America
Writer: Jim Sheridan, Naomi Sheridan, Kirsten Sheridan
Actors: Paddy Considine, Samantha Morton, Sarah Bolger, Emma Bolger
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 27 wins & 55 nominations.
